author: senh
title: 'Transit Maps of the World' makes city navigation easy
text: BING NEWS: 'Transit Maps of the World' makes city navigation easy Anyone who enjoys navigating a city by train will love this book. "Transit Maps of the World" is the third revised edition of a book originally published by World by Capital Transportation Publishing in 2003. The title was acquired by penguin.com in 2007 ... 10/22/2015 - 2:05 am | View Link I ditched Google Maps for Apple Maps, and I'm not going back The new version of Apple Maps finally offers public-transit directions, which many rival navigation apps have included for years. The new public-transit directions in Apple Maps are accurate and handy.
